resources.string: Just shake and enjoy the features.

The features that you can currently use is:

When phone is idle and screen is on:

· Shaking the phone will change ringer modes.

When phone is playing music:

· Shaking the phone will play next song.

· Turning the phone upside down will play previous song. Both features are independent of screen state.

· You can set the time in settings after which the music should stop playing. Just open the application at the time of music playing to trigger the timer.

More features coming soon…
